Title: Award criteria
Description: Award criteria are used to fulfill SPP goals: for example, allocating points relative to the percentage of recycled materials.

Title: Contract performance conditions
Description: Contract performance conditions are used to fulfill SPP goals: for example, demanding SPP-related tasks as part of the contract's implementation.

Title: Margin of preference
Description: Margins of preference are used to fulfill SPP goals: for example, accepting the bid of a local supplier that is within a margin of the lowest bid.

Title: Selection criteria
Description: Selection criteria are used to fufill SPP goals: for example, requiring a bidder to carry a sustainability certificate.

Title: Technical specifications
Description: Items' technical specifications are used to fulfill SPP goals: for example, requiring a product to have an energy efficiency certificate.
